name: Navy SEAL Alone
description:
This game is inspired by A Dark Room https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/a-dark-room/id7366...

The game is focused on a story about a Navy SEAL waking up surrounded by bodies, but not knowing what happened.  All he knows is he must keep the fire going.  Will you be good?  or bad?

This simple text based game has 2 endings!  One is pretty hard to get.

Part of the July Compsoft GAMEJAM (12 hour)
